content: NCR 120C-22 12-Ton crimper (coated) Cordless 12-Ton crimper with PVC coated head for crimping cables up to 750 kcmil │ 400 mm² (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Pipe press tools, cutters, and crimpers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Minimize downtime and liability risks – Hilti 12 ton crimpers can access our yearly certification and free tool inspection services Verified crimp quality – extensive 3rd party tests following IEC, DIN, NF and UL standards Boost productivity – extra-large crimping capacity, auto-retract function and manual retract stop helps you save time on repetitive crimping tasks Comprehensive safety features – electronic trigger lock and audiovisual signals to better protect the operator while crimping On the Nuron battery platform – cordless hydraulic tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries verified tool quality and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Crimping copper and aluminum conductors from 10-400 mm² Crimping insulated cable lugs and connectors and insulated pin terminals from 10-150 mm² Crimping tubular cable lugs and connectors for fine stranded conductors from 10-150 mm² Crimping compression cable lugs (DIN 46235) and connectors (DIN 46237, part 1) from 10-300 mm² Crimping copper and aluminum cables up to 750 kcmil ### TECHNICAL DATA: Crimping capacity: 10-400 mm² Al (fine stranded), 10-400 mm² Al (stranded), 10-400 mm² Cu (fine stranded), 10-400 mm² Cu (stranded), 750 kcmil Al, 750 kcmil Cu Dimensions (LxWxH): 14.6 x 4.1 x 16.7 mm Battery System: Nuron Technical Data | Crimping capacity | 10-400 mm² Al (fine stranded), 10-400 mm² Al (stranded), 10-400 mm² Cu (fine stranded), 10-400 mm² Cu (stranded), 750 kcmil Al, 750 kcmil Cu | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 14.6 x 4.1 x 16.7 mm | Battery System | Nuron | Rated voltage | 21.6 V | Head rotation | 350 ° | Approx. cycle time | 9 s ### ITEMS- 2313578 - Cordl. crimper NCR 120C-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NCR 120C-22 Cordl. crimper
